Class Campfire

java.lang.Object
gamePackages.map.Campfire
public class Campfire extends Object
Represents a campfire in the game world, which serves as a point of interaction for the player. The `Campfire` class provides methods for rendering the campfire, its interaction hitbox, and displaying interaction prompts to the player.

  • Constructor Details

    • Campfire

      public Campfire(float posX, float posY)
      Constructs a `Campfire` at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      posX - The X-coordinate of the campfire.
      posY - The Y-coordinate of the campfire. This constructor initializes the campfire's position, interaction rectangle, texture, sprite, and UI elements for displaying interaction prompts.

  • Method Details

    • getPosX

      public float getPosX()
      Gets the X-coordinate of the campfire's position.
      Returns:
      The X-coordinate of the campfire.

    • setPosX

      public void setPosX(float posX)
      Sets the X-coordinate of the campfire's position.
      Parameters:
      posX - The new X-coordinate of the campfire.

    • getPosY

      public float getPosY()
      Gets the Y-coordinate of the campfire's position.
      Returns:
      The Y-coordinate of the campfire.

    • setPosY

      public void setPosY(float posY)
      Sets the Y-coordinate of the campfire's position.
      Parameters:
      posY - The new Y-coordinate of the campfire.

    • getInteractionRectangle

      public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle getInteractionRectangle()
      Gets the rectangle representing the campfire's interaction zone.
      Returns:
      The interaction rectangle.

    • renderCampfire

      public void renderCampfire(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
      Renders the campfire sprite at its position.
      Parameters:
      batch - The `SpriteBatch` used for rendering.
      camera - The `OrthographicCamera` used to adjust the projection matrix.

    • renderCampfireHitbox

      public void renderCampfireHitbox(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
      Renders the campfire's interaction hitbox for debugging purposes.
      Parameters:
      camera - The `OrthographicCamera` used to adjust the projection matrix.

    • renderInteraction

      public void renderInteraction(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, Player player)
      Renders the interaction prompt if the player is within the interaction zone.
      Parameters:
      batch - The `SpriteBatch` used for rendering.
      player - The player whose interaction rectangle is checked.
